```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Recovered

```{r, fig.width=8, fig.height=5, warning=FALSE}
csse_table %>% 
    subset(subset == "recovered") %>%
    mutate(week = epiweek(date)) %>%
    group_by(`week`, `CountryRegion`) %>%
    summarise(count = max(count)) %>%
    .plot_function(group = plot_group)
```
